App just sucks now. Using on Samsung Z Fold7 and S25 Ultra. Once you tap the hamburger menu, previously, there use to be an option/entry to control the notification settings. No longer there. If scroll all the way to the bottom, it says the "app preferences" have been moved to the profile tab. Would have been nice to have a link to tap on to get there. So then you go to the profile tab but the notification settngs still aren't there. Now located under some random gear icon that have to hunt for.
